titles.title: Department of Environmental Protection Act
To elevate the Environmental Protection Agency to Cabinet-level status and redesignate such agency as the Department of Environmental Protection.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy Policy, Natural Resources and Regulatory Affairs.

committee.name: House Government Reform

term.name: Advice and consent of the Senate

bill.summary: 1/7/2003--Introduced. Department of Environmental Protection Act - Redesignates the Environmental Protection Agency as the Department of Environmental Protection, to be headed by a Secretary of Environmental Protection who shall be appointed by the President, by and with the advice and consent of the Senate.
